meanings.definition: The upper part of the human body, containing the brain and other organs.
meanings.sent1: She bumped her heads on the low doorway.
meanings.sent2: The baby has a soft spot on their heads.
meanings.sent3: Heads up! Watch out for that tree branch!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were swimming in her heads like fish in a pond.
meanings.sent5: The heads of the flowers swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The top or front of something.
meanings.sent1: The heads of the bookshelf were beautifully carved.
meanings.sent2: The heads of the mountains were covered in snow.
meanings.sent3: The heads of the line were excited to enter the amusement park.
meanings.sent4: The heads of the waves crashed against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The heads of the building gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A person in charge or leader.
meanings.sent1: The heads of the company made an important decision.
meanings.sent2: The heads of the team led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The heads of the household organized a family meeting.
meanings.sent4: She was the heads of the student council.
meanings.sent5: The heads of the tribe were respected by all.

meanings.definition: To move in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The boat heads towards the island.
meanings.sent2: The car heads down the street.
meanings.sent3: The cat heads towards its favorite napping spot.
meanings.sent4: The hiker heads up the mountain trail.
meanings.sent5: The bird heads south for the winter.

meanings.definition: To be in charge or take responsibility.
meanings.sent1: She heads the project with efficiency.
meanings.sent2: He heads the department with authority.
meanings.sent3: The dog heads the pack during their walks.
meanings.sent4: The teacher heads the class discussion.
meanings.sent5: The captain heads the ship through rough waters.
